title: A monitor of which stage you are in to becoming "reformed"
body: I was wondering if there is a way to see how many more weeks, or months I need to be able to be considered "reformed." I want this to see how much longer it will be before I can start to open those cool new Hextech chests.

replies.body:
It's really based on how many games you play not how long. So get out there and play and show riot that you've reformed.
Happened to me also, good luck brother
